casebody.data:
NEVADA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Petitioner,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Jennifer P. Togliatti, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Scott Raymond Dozier, Real Party in Interest. The State of Nevada and Clark County District Attorney, Petitioner,
v.
The Eighth Judicial District Court of the State of Nevada, in and for the County of Clark; and the Honorable Jennifer P. Togliatti, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Scott Raymond Dozier, Real Party in Interest. No. 74679
No. 74722 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED MAY 10, 2018

GRANTED. DENIED.
